org.seedstack.mongodb.morphia

Class BaseMorphiaRepository<A extends AggregateRoot<ID>,ID>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.seedstack.business.domain.BaseRepository<A,ID>
      • org.seedstack.mongodb.morphia.BaseMorphiaRepository<A,ID>
  • Type Parameters:
    A - Aggregate root class.
    ID - Identifier class.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Repository<A,ID>

    public abstract class BaseMorphiaRepository<A extends AggregateRoot<ID>,ID>
extends BaseRepository<A,ID>
    This class can serve as a base class for Morphia repositories. It provides methods for common CRUD operations as well as access to the data store through the getDatastore() ()} protected method.

      • addOrUpdate

        public A addOrUpdate(A aggregate)
        Description copied from interface: Repository
        Adds an aggregate to the repository or updates it if it already exists. This operation can be useful in some circumstances but operations with clearer semantics like Repository.add(A) and Repository.update(AggregateRoot) should be preferred.
        Parameters:
        aggregate - the aggregate to update.
        Returns:
        the update aggregate.
